mapper.sql: id, site_id, trades_id, seller_id, buyer_id, seller_nick, buyer_nick, goods_id, pay_time, end_time, consign_time, receiver_phone, recevier_mobile, recevier_name, receiver_city, receiver_address, receiver_zip, seller_pay_no, seller_phone, seller_mobile, seller_name, trades_status, is_refund, closed_resion, total_fee, post_fee, real_pay, trades_split, plat_split, post_style, delivery_name, post_id, post_name, post_number, buyer_message, seller_memo, buyer_flag, seller_flag, delv_time, delv_desc, confirm_goods_time, buyer_pay_no, pay_style, pay_number, trades_source, trades_invoice, invoice_title, trades_store, self_taken_store, self_taken_code, self_taken_code_start, self_taken_code_expires, self_taken_code_checktime, assigned_stores, stockup_status, shipping_status, prescription_orders, lng, lat, store_user_id, store_shipping_clerk_id, recommend_user_id, cashier_id, stockup_user_id, user_paying, trades_del, trades_rank, trades_rank_time, settlement_status, settlement_final_time, create_time, update_time, settlement_type, create_order_assigned_stores, budgetdate, is_payment, account_checking_status
mapper.select: SELECT count(0) FROM b_trades WHERE site_id=#{siteId} and buyer_id=#{buyerId}
SELECT count(0) FROM b_trades WHERE site_id=#{siteId} and buyer_id=#{buyerId} and is_payment=1

SELECT count(*) FROM b_trades WHERE site_id=#{siteId} and assigned_stores=#{storeId}
and trades_status =120 and stockup_status=110
and trades_status in(120,130) and stockup_status=120 and post_style=150
and trades_status = 200 and stockup_status=120 and post_style=160
and trades_status = 110 and post_style=170

SELECT bt.recevier_name AS recevierName, bt.store_user_id AS storeUserId, bt.trades_id AS tradesId, bt.recevier_mobile AS recevierMobile, date_format(bt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime, bt.receiver_address AS receiverAddress, bt.post_style AS postStyle, bt.trades_status AS tradesStatus, bt.real_pay AS realPay, bte.integral_price AS integralPrice, bte.reduce_reduction_amount AS reduceReductionAmount, bte.user_coupon_id AS userCouponId, bte.user_coupon_amount AS userCouponAmount, bt.post_fee AS postFee, bt.is_refund AS isRefund, bt.self_taken_store AS selfTakenStoreName, bt.assigned_stores AS assignedStoresName, bt.pay_style AS payStyle, bt.recommend_user_id AS storeSalerCode FROM b_trades bt LEFT JOIN b_trades_ext bte ON bt.trades_id=bte.trades_id AND bt.site_id=bte.site_id WHERE bt.trades_id = #{tradesId} AND bt.site_id = #{siteId}
AND bt.trades_store = #{storeId}

SELECT bt.recevier_name AS recevierName, bt.store_user_id AS storeUserId, bt.trades_id AS tradesId, bt.recevier_mobile AS recevierMobile, date_format(bt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime, bt.receiver_address AS receiverAddress, bt.post_style AS postStyle, bt.trades_status AS tradesStatus, bt.real_pay AS realPay, bte.integral_price AS integralPrice, bte.reduce_reduction_amount AS reduceReductionAmount, bte.user_coupon_id AS userCouponId, bte.user_coupon_amount AS userCouponAmount, bt.post_fee AS postFee, bt.is_refund AS isRefund, bt.self_taken_store AS selfTakenStoreName, bt.assigned_stores AS assignedStoresName, bt.pay_style AS payStyle, bt.recommend_user_id AS storeSalerCode FROM b_trades bt LEFT JOIN b_trades_ext bte ON bt.trades_id=bte.trades_id AND bt.site_id=bte.site_id WHERE bt.self_taken_code = #{deliveryCode} AND bt.site_id = #{siteId}
AND bt.assigned_stores = #{storeId}

select recevier_mobile AS recevierMobile, trades_id AS tradesId, case when real_pay is null then 0 else real_pay end AS realPay, date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime, receiver_address AS receiverAddress, case when post_style is null then 130 else post_style end AS postStyle, case when trades_status is null then 110 else trades_status end AS tradesStatus from b_trades where site_id = #{siteId} AND assigned_stores = #{storeId} AND store_shipping_clerk_id = #{storeShippingClerkId} AND post_style=150 AND trades_status=130

select recevier_mobile AS recevierMobile, trades_id AS tradesId, case when real_pay is null then 0 else real_pay end AS realPay, date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime, receiver_address AS receiverAddress, case when post_style is null then 130 else post_style end AS postStyle, case when trades_status is null then 110 else trades_status end AS tradesStatus from b_trades where site_id = #{siteId} AND assigned_stores = #{storeId} AND post_style = '170' AND trades_status=110 ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT count(*) from b_trades WHERE assigned_stores = #{storeId}
AND post_style = 160 AND trades_status=200 and site_id = #{siteId}
SELECT pay_time from b_trades WHERE store_user_id = #{storeUserId} AND pay_time like CONCAT("%",#{month},"%") and post_style = 170
SELECT * FROM b_trades WHERE store_user_id = #{storeUserId} AND pay_time like CONCAT("%",#{time},"%") AND post_style = 170 AND site_id = #{siteId}

SELECT count(*) from b_trades WHERE site_id = #{siteId} AND assigned_stores = #{storeId}
AND post_style=170 AND trades_status=110

SELECT count(*) from b_trades WHERE assigned_stores = #{storeId} AND store_shipping_clerk_id = #{storeUserId}
AND post_style=150 AND trades_status=130 and site_id = #{siteId}
SELECT count(*) from b_trades WHERE store_user_id = #{storeUserId} AND post_style = 170 AND confirm_goods_time like CONCAT("%",#{time},"%") AND site_id = #{siteId}

select
from b_trades where site_id = #{siteId} AND trades_store = #{storeId} AND post_style = '170' AND (trades_status = '110' OR trades_status = '120' OR trades_status = '130')

select
from b_trades where site_id = #{siteId} AND trades_store = #{storeId} AND store_shipping_clerk_id = #{storeShippingClerkId} AND (post_style='150' OR post_style='180') AND (trades_status='110' OR trades_status='120' OR trades_status='130')

mapper.update:
update b_trades
trades_id = #{tradesId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
buyer_id = #{buyerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
seller_nick = #{sellerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
buyer_nick = #{buyerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
consign_time = #{consignTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
receiver_phone = #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recevier_mobile = #{recevierMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recevier_name = #{recevierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_city = #{receiverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_address = #{receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_zip = #{receiverZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seller_pay_no = #{sellerPayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seller_phone = #{sellerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seller_mobile = #{sellerMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seller_name = #{sellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trades_status = #{tradesStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_refund = #{isRefund,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
closed_resion = #{closedResion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_fee = #{totalFee,jdbcType=INTEGER},
post_fee = #{postFee,jdbcType=INTEGER},
real_pay = #{realPay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trades_split = #{tradesSplit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
plat_split = #{platSplit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
post_style = #{postStyle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delivery_name = #{deliveryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
post_name = #{postName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_number = #{postNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
buyer_message = #{buyerMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seller_memo = #{sellerMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
buyer_flag = #{buyerFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
seller_flag = #{sellerFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delv_time = #{delvTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delv_desc = #{delvDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
confirm_goods_time = #{confirmGoodsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
buyer_pay_no = #{buyerPayNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_style = #{payStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_number = #{payNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trades_source = #{tradesSource,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trades_invoice = #{tradesInvoice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invoice_title = #{invoiceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trades_store = #{tradesStore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
self_taken_store = #{selfTakenStore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
self_taken_code = #{selfTakenCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
self_taken_code_start = #{selfTakenCodeStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
self_taken_code_expires = #{selfTakenCodeExpires,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
self_taken_code_checktime = #{selfTakenCodeChecktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
assigned_stores = #{assignedStores,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stockup_status = #{stockupStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shipping_status = #{shippingStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
prescription_orders = #{prescriptionOrders,jdbcType=BIT},
lng = #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
store_user_id = #{storeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
store_shipping_clerk_id = #{storeShippingClerkId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recommend_user_id = #{recommendUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cashier_id = #{cashierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stockup_user_id = #{stockupUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_paying = #{userPaying,jdbcType=TINYINT},
trades_del = #{tradesDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trades_rank = #{tradesRank,jdbcType=TINYINT},
trades_rank_time = #{tradesRankTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
settlement_status = #{settlementStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
settlement_final_time = #{settlementFinalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
settlement_type = #{settlementType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_order_assigned_stores = #{createOrderAssignedStores,jdbcType=INTEGER},
budgetdate = #{budgetdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_payment = #{isPayment,jdbcType=BIT},
account_checking_status = #{accountCheckingStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update b_trades set trades_id = #{tradesId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buyer_id = #{buyerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seller_nick = #{sellerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_nick = #{buyerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, consign_time = self_taken_code_checktime = #{selfTakenCodeChecktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, assigned_stores = #{assignedStores,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stockup_status = #{stockupStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shipping_status = mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id,o.goods_id,o.goods_title,o.goods_price,o.goods_num,o.goods_gifts,o.approval_number,o.specif_cation,o.goods_category,o.trades_id,o.goods_imgurl,o.goods_code,o.yb_goods_id,o.goods_batch_no,o.trades_snapshot, g.goods_status,g.goods_code,g.drug_category, b.barnd_name as goods_brand from b_orders as o LEFT JOIN b_goods as g on o.goods_id = g.goods_id and o.site_id = g.site_id LEFT JOIN b_barnd as b on g.barnd_id = b.barnd_id and g.site_id = b.site_id where o.trades_id = #{tradesId} AND o.site_id = #{siteId}
SELECT count(0) FROM b_trades WHERE buyer_id=#{buyer_id} limit 1

SELECT IFNULL(date_format(max(create_time),'%Y/%m/%d'),"无") maxTime,count(1) totalNum ,IF(count(1)!=0,sum(total_fee)/100,0) totalFee, IF(count(1)!=0,avg(total_fee)/100,0) avgFee FROM b_trades WHERE site_id = #{siteId} AND buyer_id = #{buyerId} AND deal_finish_status = 1 and (is_refund = 0 or is_refund = 110) and is_payment = 1

SELECT COUNT(*) AS num FROM b_trades WHERE trades_status=110 AND site_id=#{siteId} AND ( (b_trades.store_user_id =#{storeUserId}and b_trades.trades_source = 130) OR (b_trades.assigned_stores = #{storeId}) and b_trades.post_style= 170)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num FROM b_trades WHERE trades_status=120 AND site_id=#{siteId} AND assigned_stores=#{storeId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM b_trades WHERE post_style=150 AND trades_status=130 AND site_id=#{siteId} AND store_shipping_clerk_id=#{storeShippingClerkId} AND assigned_stores=#{storeId}

SELECT bt.site_id,CONCAT(bt.trades_id,'') trades_id,date_format(bt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS create_time,bt.post_style,bt.self_taken_store,bt.assigned_stores,bt.real_pay ,IFNULL(bs.name,'总部') AS storename,date_format(bt.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS end_time FROM b_trades AS bt LEFT JOIN b_stores bs ON bs.site_id=bt.site_id AND bt.assigned_stores=bs.id AND bt.post_style in(150,160,170) WHERE bt.buyer_id=#{buyerId} AND bt.site_id=#{siteId} AND bt.is_payment=1 ORDER BY bt.create_time DESC

SELECT COUNT(1) from b_trades b LEFT JOIN b_clerk_visit c on b.site_id=c.site_id and b.buyer_id =c.buyer_id LEFT JOIN b_promotions_activity ba on ba.site_id=b.site_id and ba.id in (c.activity_ids) where find_in_set(#{activityId},c.activity_ids) and b.pay_time >= ba.start_time and b.pay_time <= ba.end_time and b.site_id=#{siteId} and b.is_payment=1 and b.trades_source=140

SELECT b.* from b_trades b LEFT JOIN b_clerk_visit c on b.site_id=c.site_id and b.buyer_id =c.buyer_id LEFT JOIN b_promotions_activity ba on ba.site_id=b.site_id and ba.id in (c.activity_ids) where find_in_set(#{activityId},c.activity_ids) and b.pay_time >= ba.start_time and b.pay_time <= ba.end_time and b.site_id=#{siteId} and b.is_payment=1 and b.trades_source=140

SELECT t.trades_id tradesId, t.assigned_stores storeId, t.store_user_id storeAdminId, m.shopwx_url wxShopDomain FROM b_trades t LEFT JOIN yb_merchant m ON t.site_id=m.merchant_id WHERE t.trades_id = #{tradesId}
